ygData.subject: Re: Stein Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: And he hate s DE enchanters in any form I ve tried. :)  I was level 10 at the time, so I didn t get to try erudite, halfling, or high elf. :) Ezrae
ygData.messageBody:
And he hate's DE enchanters in any form I've tried. :) I was level 10
at the time, so I didn't get to try erudite, halfling, or high elf. :)

Ezrae

James Meyer wrote:

> >Every time I did it I gave all the ingredients to him at once. As a
> high elf, I never had a problem with the ogre, who actually cons
> better to me than the barkeep does. Aren't factions screwy
> things?That's because he is an ogre outcast. He was hated in Oggok
> and shunned, because he was too smart. The barbarian saved him from
> Guk when he was young, though, and they have been friends since. He
> is not quite a typical ogre. I'm not sure exactly what faction he is,
> but he hates Enchanters in Ogre form. : ) And DE form.Eltanin
> Soulblade, Enchanter, Mith MarrSaidan Soulblade, Paladin, Mith Marr
>
> James Meyer
